items.sentence: You have to hurry if you want to go with them.
You'll be scolded when your mother comes home.
You don't have to eat it if you don't want to.
You'll find yourself in a miserable situation.
You know I'd never let anything happen to you.
You should probably buy a ticket for Tom, too.
You want me to wash my hands first, don't you?
You won't find anyone who'll help you do that.
You were thinking the same thing, weren't you?
You'll feel better after a good night's sleep.
You seem to remember everything that happened.
You don't believe everything you hear, do you?
You seem a little better than you were before.
You don't have to answer all of the questions.
You had something to do with this, didn't you?
You handled that particular problem very well.
You have absolutely no idea what we had to do.
You implied that you knew what you were doing.
Defenestrate your clock to see how time flies.
Tom needs to know that that's going to happen.
I wonder why people thought that was so funny.
Tom believes Mary will do well in her new job.
I believe that I have no legal right to do so.
It was easier than I thought that it would be.
It's hard to believe Tom could murder someone.
Is it really worth what they're asking for it?
Electric guitars are often made of alder wood.
I don't know when Tom is planning to get here.
I had to plead with them to allow me to leave.
I'd definitely buy one of those if I were you.
What's the purpose of your visit to Australia?
Do you really think that that's going to work?
Tom checked out a book from the local library.
After you finish reading this letter, burn it.
I assume that you're willing to take the risk.
I like cracking sunflower seeds with my teeth.
I've been doing this for the past three years.
I've been told you're looking for a caregiver.
Tom said that he wanted to borrow my umbrella.
Tom was sleeping in the back of the classroom.
I won't feel like doing that tomorrow, either.
This is the corner where Tom was hit by a car.
Tom will probably be the last person to leave.
This is the place where the incident happened.
This is the first time I've visited Australia.
This is the best method to solve that problem.
This is fairly good except for minor mistakes.
We should've been doing it this way all along.
We need to decide what we're going to do soon.
It's a great privilege being with you tonight.
